name: Traumatic Brain Injury State Demonstration Grant Program
objective: To create and strengthen a system of services and supports that maximizes the independence, well-being, and health of people with TBI across the lifespan and all other demographics, their family members, and support networks.
top_agency_name: Department of Health and Human Services
beneficiary_types: Physically Afflicted (e.g. TB, Arthritis, Heart Disease)

authorizations.text: Public Health Service Act, Title XII, Section 1252 (42 USC 300d-52) as amended by the Children’s Health Act of 2000, sec.1304, PL 106-310, as further amended by the Traumatic Brain Injury Act of 2008, sec. 6(a), PL 110-206. 2014 (P.L.113-196). (P.L. 115-377).

rules_regulations: This program is subject to the provisions of 45 CFR Part 92 for State, local and tribal governments and 45 CFR Part 74 for institutions of higher education, hospitals, other nonprofit organizations and commercial organizations, as applicable.
